item.title: Desert Quest
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Ok well I have full working desert quest with all diamonds and everything and I want to make it so that you can’t use ancients unless you finish the quest.So like if your not done it you can’t see anicnets on anicnets tab but if you are they show up.I know its possible because they have it on battlescape blitz.But i have a problem to I ahve the command ::switch so I would have to remove it. And I want to make it so that when you click the anicnet altar like the one that you pray at to switch ancients, i want it to make it so when you have all the diamonds and when you click use the diamond with the altar it now shows the ancients on the anicnets tab.So far I have this at the end of the quest so that when you use the diamond with the alter it says congrats and you get a anicnets staff.

if((playerHasItemAmount(4670, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4671, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4672, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4673, 1)==false)) { sendMessage("you dont got all diamonds."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(4670, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4671, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4672, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4673, 1)==true)) { addItem(4675, 1); sendMessage("Well done you have done the quest"); startAnimation(862); deleteItem(4670,getItemSlot(4670), 1); deleteItem(4671,getItemSlot(4671), 1); deleteItem(4672,getItemSlot(4672), 1); deleteItem(4673,getItemSlot(4673), 1); q1stage = -1; }

Read full topic
